description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect from the co-op multiplayer update coming to No Rest for the Wicked in this latest video for the action RPG from developer Moon Studios. The No Rest for the Wicked Together Update will be available on January 22, 2026, and a public beta begins today, December 18, 2025. No Rest for the Wicked is out now in Early Access on PC via Steam.

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Things aren't looking good for Xbox on the hardware front. The latest sales data from Circana shows a massive 70% drop in Xbox hardware sales year-over-year in the U.S. To be fair, hardware sales for the PlayStation 5 and the Nintendo Switch 1 and 2 were also down from November of 2024, but these numbers are especially damaging to Xbox. This year alone saw two significant price hikes on Xbox hardware. In other news, Sony and Tencent have agreed to a 'confidential settlement' with the Light of Motiram lawsuit. The game has now seemingly been pulled from Steam and the Epic Game Store. No cancellation has been announced. And finally, FIFA is back as the organization has announced a new game in partnership with...Netflix?
title: Xbox Sales Hit All-Time November Low in the U.S. - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Path of Exile 2’s The Last of the Druids update is here, bringing the long-awaited Druid class, new ascendancy options, and a fresh league mechanic to the ARPG. While it doesn’t deliver the full endgame overhaul many players have been waiting for, the 0.4 update still introduces a wide range of meaningful additions and balance changes.

In this video, we break down everything added in Path of Exile 2’s 0.4 update, including the Druid’s shapeshifting forms, new Sorceress ascendancy Disciple of Varashta, the Vaal Ruins league mechanic, and endgame changes like Abyss going core and major adjustments to monster density, loot, and experience.

00:00 Intro
00:35 Druid
01:44 New Sorceress Ascendancy
02:27 The Fate of the Vaal
03:10 Endgame Changes
title: Path of Exile 2: The Last of the Druids Adds the Druid and Big 0.4 Changes

author: IGN
description:
We finally got our first teaser for Avengers: Doomsday and... it's Cap? Chris Evans is back as Steve Rogers, Captain America, in our first look at the much anticipated 5th Avengers movie. Seeing The First Avenger return to the big screen ought to be cause for celebration so... why are we a little bummed out by this? As exciting as it is to see Steve Rogers rejoining the MCU, it's a potentially very disappointing sign, but can Avengers: Doomsday correct Marvel's biggest failure since Endgame? Based on this trailer, they're betting big that it will.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU
title: Cap's Back! But Will Avengers: Doomsday Correct Marvel's Biggest Failure?

Get another look at SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tides in this latest trailer, and see what some critics are saying about the 3D platformer game. SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tides is available now on Nintendo Switch 2, PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

Watch the Minecraft x SpongeBob SquarePants trailer to see what to expect with the SpongeBob SquarePants Biomes DLC, featuring 18 new Bikini Bottom biomes, like Rock Bottom, Jellyfish Fields, and Davey Jones’s Locker. Additionally, you can get a free Fishhook Hat from the Minecraft Marketplace.

author: IGN
description:
On a remote island, Willa (Billie Boullet) lives under the watch of her father (Luke Evans), a battle-scarred veteran who trains her to survive while her mother (Milla Jovovich) fights monstrous Breakers on the front lines. When a mysterious girl washes ashore, Willa discovers the war they fled has found them, and she must choose to run or fight.

The sci-fi thriller directed by Brad Anderson (The Machinist, Session 9) will be released theatrically in the US on January 30, 2026, via AURA Entertainment.

#Worldbreaker #SciFi #Action
title: Worldbreaker: Exclusive Trailer (2026) Luke Evans, Milla Jovovich, Billie Boullet

author: IGN
description:
Here's our best anime series of 2025. From the haunting, The Summer Hikaru Died, to the chaotic fun of Dan Da Dan Season 2, this year gave us a ton of anime to enjoy. Which anime series is crowned the best of the year? Check out our list of the full nominees and the 2025 winner!

Note: For IGN's best anime series award, anime must have completed airing their season or cour/parts in the U.S. by our 2025 voting period in order to be eligible. For example, Gachiakuta will be considered for the following year.

#IGN #Anime
title: Best Anime Series of 2025

author: IGN
description: If the hour of High on Life 2 I played is any indication, it’s got a great chance to be as funny as – and possibly even more fun on the gameplay side than – the 2022 original. In that hour alone, I wandered around a beautiful beachside alien town, met a semi-depressed new gun named Travis and got completely wasted with him, impressed some alien teenagers with my skateboarding skills, circumcised a giant alien phallus with a laser, stole the fedora from the 1996 movie Dunston Checks In, tried (unsuccessfully) to solve a murder mystery, and bounty-hunted a billionaire who, yes, met his demise. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey
title: High on Life 2: The Final Preview – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for the Alpha launch trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy!
 
Players will have access to a variety of companions, be able to go hands-on with the revamped combat system, and uncover mysteries with the new detective systems all across the 10-15 hours available to play! 

The Alpha will be live for several months, so there is plenty of time to jump in and provide feedback to shape the future of the game. 

Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy is coming soon to PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GoG)

#IGN #Warhammer40KDarkHeresy #Warhammer40k #OwlCatGames
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy - Official Alpha Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get ready to clean up the Land of Ooo. Watch the latest PowerWash Simulator 2 for the sim game to see the crossover announcement, featuring Adventure Time. The Adventure Time DLC pack features five Adventure Time locations to wash and explore, new custom equipment, and a new storyline with Princess Bubblegum, Finn, Jake, The Ice King, Gunter and The Party God. 

The Adventure Time Special pack will be available for PowerWash Simulator 2 in Spring 2026 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2.
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 - Official Adventure Time Pack Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a deep dive into what you can expect from Chapter 3 of Dune: Awakening in this latest trailer for the open-world MMO survival game. Learn about the details of Chapter 3, including an Endgame revamp, new maps, new missions, testing stations, the Raiders of the Broken Lands DLC, and more. Chapter 3 of Dune: Awakening will be available in early 2026.
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Chapter 3 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the World War Z x The Walking Dead collaboration trailer for this upcoming DLC for the co-op zombie shooter game. The Walking Dead DLC for World War Z includes a new campaign featuring three stories, starring characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead, including Rick Grimes, Daryl Dixon, Negan, and Michonne, with the voices of Andrew Lincoln and Norman Reedus reprising their fan-favorite characters. 

From the Prison to the Alexandria Safe Zone and Grady Memorial Hospital, you’ll fight to survive against new versions of World War Z’s infamous Zeke swarms inspired by The Walking Dead’s uniquely slower-moving but no less deadly Walkers.

The DLC also brings new melee weapons: Michonne's Katana and Negan’s Bat “Lucille," along with two new weapon skins: Rick’s Revolver and Daryl’s Crossbow.

World War Z is available now on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. The World War Z x The Walking Dead DLC will launch in January 2026 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One,
title: World War Z x The Walking Dead - Official DLC Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest GTA Online trailer for a look at the Progen Luiva (Super). Don’t be alarmed by the absence of a roof, windshield, or windows — that’s all part of Progen’s creative vision... and the Luiva’s goal of fusing high-caliber performance with weightlessness. 

The Progen Luiva (Super) is available now from Legendary Motorsport or the Luxury Autos window display in GTA Online. GTA+ Members can also pick it up at The Vinewood Car Club showroom on Elysian Island.

#IGN #GTAOnline #GTA5
title: GTA Online - Official Progen Luiva Supercar Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the final trailer for Anaconda, an upcoming comedy adventure movie starring Jack Black and Paul Rudd. The film also stars Steve Zahn, Thandiwe Newton, Daniela Melchior, and Selton Mello.

This is not a reboot. It is an entirely original comedy, inspired by the cinematic ‘classic' “Anaconda,” that features Doug (Jack Black) and Griff (Paul Rudd), who have been best friends since they were kids and always dreamed of remaking their all-time favorite movie. When a midlife crisis pushes them to finally go for it, they head deep into the Amazon to start filming. But things get real when an actual giant anaconda appears, turning their comically chaotic movie set into a deadly situation. The movie they’re dying to make? It might just get them killed...

Anaconda is produced by Brad Fuller, Andrew Form, Kevin Etten, and Tom Gormican. Samson Mücke serves as executive producer. It is written by Tom Gormican & Kevin Etten.

Anaconda, directed by Tom Gormican, opens in theaters on December 2
title: Anaconda - Official Final Trailer (2025) Jack Black, Paul Rudd, Thandiwe Newton

author: IGN
description:
Check out this extended slice of gameplay from Kusan: City of Wolves, which bills itself as "a high-octane hardcore top-down shooter set in a brutal urban jungle" that takes clear inspiration from Hotline Miami. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714510/Kusan_City_of_Wolves/

#IGN #gaming
title: Kusan: City of Wolves – 21 Minutes of Hotline Miami-Style Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
It’s a herder mystery, and everyone is a suspect. Check out The Sheep Detectives trailer for this upcoming film starring Hugh Jackman, Nicholas Braun, Nicholas Galitzine, Molly Gordon, with Hong Chau and Emma Thompson, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Bryan Cranston, Chris O’Dowd, Regina Hall, Patrick Stewart, Bella Ramsey, and Rhys Darby.

In this witty, new breed of mystery, George (Hugh Jackman) is a shepherd who reads detective novels to his beloved sheep every night, assuming they can’t possibly understand. But when a mysterious incident disrupts life on the farm, the sheep realize they must become the detectives. As they follow the clues and investigate human suspects, they prove that even sheep can be brilliant crime-solvers.

The Sheep Detectives arrives in theaters May 2026.

#IGN #SheepDetectives #Comedy
title: The Sheep Detectives - Official Trailer (2026) Hugh Jackman, Emma Thompson, Patrick Stewart

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond 926, A new Star Wars game? Awesome! From Casey Hudson, who gave us Mass Effect and KOTOR? Incredible! And it’s an action RPG set in The Old Republic? This is all stuff to be excited about if we couldn’t help but feel like this game is a very long way off, assuming it even gets finished by the newly formed Arcanaut Studios. We’ve been waiting 4+ years for any news on Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic’s remake and Star Wars: Eclipse, and in that time have heard about several Star Wars projects, video game or otherwise that are either in development or in development hell. It’s a frustrating time to be a fan of video games set in this universe, so hopefully Arcanaut Studios can prove us all wrong sometime this decade.

Check out the full episode of Beyond here! - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6x9qCfQiUq8&t=34s

This weeks show is Hosted by Max Scoville, Brian Altano, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, and is produced by Nick Maillet. 

#KOTOR #StarWars
title: Fate of the Old Republic: We’ve Been Burned By Star Wars Too Much To Be Excited - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Time to party like it's 1998! 
Beneath is getting a new retro-mode that changes the aesthetic for something more nostalgic. Paying homage to the horror games of the late 90s, this new update gives you that old-time CRT monitor vibe with lowered resolution and scanlines to complete the look! 
Beneath is out now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GoG)
title: Beneath - Official 1998 Retro Mode Trailer

title: Oppidum - Official Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Terminator 2D: No Fate reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on PlayStation 4 & 5, Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S, and Switch.

"Terminator 2D: No Fate is totally committed to being an unflinching homage to the 16-bit era. This brings with it an extremely brief runtime – and I’m unconvinced the supplementary modes developer Bitmap Bureau has injected are going to be enough to have me guarantee I’ll be back – but it can’t be understated just how much it succeeds as a wonderfully realised tribute to one of the single greatest movies ever made. It arguably under-utilises its supreme asset in the titular Terminator itself, but it’s otherwise a consistently entertaining and rewarding time capsule punctuated with pitch-perfect music, exquisite pixel art, and brilliant Easter eggs. Terminator 2D: No Fate isn’t just the best Terminator 2 game ever – it may just be the best way to revisit the ’90s this side of hitching a ride to the past in a ball of electricity with your junk out. Trust m
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate Review

description:
Get ready for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond with 5 things you need to know! 
From the new abilities Control Beam and Psychic Glove, the mysterious planet Viewros, the new traversal tool Vi-O-La, and the new Quality & Performance Modes and Mouse Controls on Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. 
You can check it all out in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, available December 4th only on the Nintendo Switch family of consoles. Presented by Nintendo.

#IGN #MetroidPrime4 #NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch @NintendoAUNZ
